snippet.title: Mini Motor Racing X - Launch Trailer | PS4, PS VR
snippet.description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-ca/games/mini-motor-racing-x-ps4/

Available NOW on PlayStation®4 and PS VR!
Grab your controller or strap on your VR headset and dive into the high-octane frenzy that is Mini Motor Racing X! The classic Mini Motor career mode is back, with hundreds of races, dozens of cars to unlock and upgrade, and four fiendish championships to master, but that’s not all. MMRX adds some firepower to the mix in the new Type-X mode!
